DOC.brief_summary: Adolescents concussion randomly assign treatment group receive sub-threshold exercise , assign placebo group receive structure stretching exercise . Both group receive standard medical coverage regular clinic visit . All participant record symptom daily dedicate web site . All participant evaluate time 1 ( 1 ) structure physical exam , ( 2 ) structure exercise stress test terminate symptom exacerbation . The primary outcome measure time recovery recovery define ( 1 ) asymptomatic two consecutive day , ( 2 ) ability exercise exhaustion without exacerbation symptom , ( 3 ) confirm physician base structured physical exam .
